类 MatrixRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameviewsremote.MatrixRenderer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer

    class MatrixRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
    Render the matrix in table showing the relationship of countries.

      Method to get cells in matrix and render every cell, highlight the areas for each continent, use different colors to display connections in matrix (upper_right light-gray, lower_left red).

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableCellRendererComponent

        public java.awt.Component getTableCellRendererComponent(javax.swing.JTable table,
                                                        java.lang.Object value,
                                                        boolean isSelected,
                                                        boolean hasFocus,
                                                        int row,
                                                        int column)
        Method to get cells in matrix and render every cell, highlight the areas for each continent, use different colors to display connections in matrix (upper_right light-gray, lower_left red).
        指定者:
        getTableCellRendererComponent 在接口中 javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
        参数:
        table - JTable object
        value - value of cell
        isSelected - selection status of cell
        hasFocus - focus status of cell
        row - row of cell
        column - column of cell
        返回:
        the component used for drawing the cell.
